hero.subtitle: Join us for an unforgettable night of live music featuring top local and international artists in the heart of the city.

about.p1: Get ready for the most spectacular music festival of the year! The Summer Music Festival 2024 brings together an incredible lineup of artists from various genres, creating an unforgettable experience for music lovers of all ages.
about.p2: This year's festival features over 20 artists performing across multiple stages, including headliners that will blow your mind. From indie rock to electronic dance music, from folk to hip-hop, we've curated a diverse lineup that celebrates the rich tapestry of contemporary music.
about.p3: The Central Park Amphitheater provides the perfect backdrop for this musical celebration, with its natural acoustics and beautiful outdoor setting. Whether you're dancing under the stars or relaxing on the grass, this festival promises to be an experience you'll never forget.

list.li2: Multiple stages with different music genres

lunaDreamers.desc: Soulful melodies and heartfelt lyrics that touch the soul.

bassRevolution.desc: High-energy performances with powerful beats and meaningful lyrics.

about.pageSubtitle: Learn more about our mission and team

pageHero.title: About City Events Guide
pageHero.subtitle: Connecting communities through amazing local experiences

story.title: Our Story
story.lead: City Events Guide was born from a simple idea: every community deserves to know about the amazing events happening right in their backyard.
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2020, we started as a small team of event enthusiasts who were frustrated by the scattered information about local events. We believed there had to be a better way to discover concerts, festivals, workshops, and community gatherings.
story.paragraph2: Today, we're proud to be the leading platform for local event discovery, helping thousands of people find their next favorite experience every month.

community.title: Community First
community.description: We believe in the power of community and strive to bring people together through shared experiences and local events.

discovery.title: Easy Discovery
discovery.description: Finding great events should be simple and enjoyable. We make it easy to discover experiences that match your interests.

passion.title: Passion Driven
passion.description: Our team is passionate about events and experiences. We're not just building a platform; we're creating connections.

trust.title: Trust & Safety
trust.description: We verify event organizers and provide secure ticketing to ensure safe and reliable experiences for everyone.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously improve our platform with new features and technologies to enhance your event discovery experience.

inclusivity.title: Inclusivity
inclusivity.description: We celebrate diversity and work to make events accessible to everyone, regardless of background or ability.

q1.question: How do I list my event on City Events Guide?
q1.answer: Listing your event is easy! Simply contact us through the form above with "List My Event" as the subject, or email us directly at partnerships@cityevents.com. We'll guide you through our simple submission process and help you reach more attendees.

q2.question: Is there a fee to list events?
q2.answer: We offer both free and premium listing options. Basic listings are completely free and include essential event information. Premium listings offer enhanced visibility, featured placement, and additional promotional tools for a small fee.

q3.question: How do I purchase tickets through your platform?
q3.answer: Purchasing tickets is secure and straightforward. Click on any event to view details, then select "Get Tickets" or "Purchase Tickets." You'll be guided through our secure checkout process. We accept all major credit cards and PayPal.

q4.question: Can I get refunds for purchased tickets?
q4.answer: Refund policies vary by event organizer. Most events offer refunds if cancelled by the organizer. For event-specific refund policies, check the event details page or contact the organizer directly. We're happy to help facilitate communication if needed.

q5.question: How do I stay updated on new events?
q5.answer: Subscribe to our newsletter for weekly event updates, follow us on social media, or create an account to set up personalized event alerts based on your interests and location. You can also bookmark events you're interested in.
